name: Sky Reaper
detailed_description:
Sky Reper is a vertical scroll flight shooting game. Players control the fights of different planes over the city.

Each aircraft has three different means of attack
1: Basic Attack
2: Intensive Attack
3: Bomb attack

The basic attack is related to the power of the intense attack and the player's current firepower. After eliminating a specific enemy, the player can eat blue [Power Up], up to four times. Bombs have a constant power, and players can get extra bombs by destroying specific enemies.

The difficulty of the game will gradually increase with the level. It is not easy to get through the customs. While we wait for your challenge, we also hope to bring you joy. Thank you for your support.
